description:
Langley`s Beartic was sent out to battle against Iris`s Axew after Iris accepted Langley`s taunts to battle her. Iris`s Axew was at a disadvantage against Langley`s Beartic as it knew multiple Ice moves. Langley`s Beartic quickly defeated Iris`s Axew as it was significantly stronger overall.
It then battled against Iris`s Excadrill which proved to be a more balanced fight but Iris`s Excadrill would not obey commands and ended up loosing to Langley`s Beartic.
name: Tunbear (Langley)
